amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 118-656 to add to section 2 a requirement to identify intellectual property theft of small businesses by the Chinese Communist Party.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
